title: Add product instance
content:
This page explains product instances and the steps to add a product instance record.

Add product instance

  1. Click > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Product Instances. This directs you to the Product Instances tab, which displays the product instances added to the agent interface.
  3. Click New.
  4. Specify the following details:
    Field Description
    Display label The display label for the product instance.
    Product model The product model of the instance. Only product models in the Active phase appear in the dropdown. For the procedure to change the phase of a product model, see the "Change phase of product model" section in  Product model workflow.
    Version The version of the instance. Only product versions in the Active phase appear in the dropdown. For the procedure to change the phase of a product version, see the "Change phase of version" section in Version workflow.
    Company The company that purchased the instance.
    Environment The environment where the instance is deployed. This field is not available if the product model type is a bundle.
    Contract The contract associated with the product instance. 
    Product name The product name. This field is auto-filled based on the product model.
    Serial number The serial number of the instance. This field is not available if the product model type is a bundle.
    Start date The date when the company started using the instance. This field is not available if the product model type is a bundle.
    End date The date when the company stopped using the instance. This field is not available if the product model type is a bundle.
    Description The description of the instance. 
    User options The User options section displays all custom fields defined for the selected product model, if any. Complete the fields.
  5. Click SAVE. This redirects you to the Product Instances tab. You can see the product instance record you created. If the product model type is bundle, along with the bundle instance, an instance will be created for each product in the bundle ( for each product bundle item). You can see these instances in the Product instances tab. The display names of these instances are the same as those of the corresponding product bundle items.
